DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to assess whether subjects treated with BOTOX will: 1. have a decrease in the frequency and intensity of migraine headaches 2. experience improvements in quality of life 3. experience a reduction in the frequency of health care services obtained.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of BOTOX for Migraine Headaches
DOC.criteria: Subjects > 18 years of age Subject has an established history of migraine headache, with or without aura, per IHS criteria (1.2.1 or 1.1), for at least 6 months prior to screening. Subject receives primary health care from Park Nicollet Health Services. Subject has received previous injections of botulinum toxin of any serotype for any reason, within the 6 months prior to study participation. Additional eligibility will be discussed at point of contact
